description: Adaptive Layout column definition for the Table component.
label: Table Layout Column

fieldName.description: The fieldName for the rows used in this Table component column definition.
fieldName.label: Field Name

isMultiline.description: Indicates this column is multilined in this Table component.
isMultiline.label: Multiline

isResizable.description: Indicates this column is resizable in this Table component.
isResizable.label: Resizable

key.description: The key for this column used in this Table component.
key.label: Key

maxWidth.description: The maximum width for this column used in this Table component.
maxWidth.label: Max Width

minWidth.description: The minimum width for this column used in this Table component.
minWidth.label: Min Width

name.description: The name to display for this column used in this Table component.
name.label: Name
